statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes FROM social_media_engagement WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT post_id, post_content, shares FROM social_media_engagement WHERE shares < 50;
SELECT post_id, comments, sentiment_analysis FROM social_media_engagement WHERE comments >= 10;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes, shares, comments, sentiment_analysis FROM social_media_engagement WHERE likes >= 50 ORDER BY shares DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes, shares, comments, sentiment_analysis FROM social_media_engagement WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement WHERE likes > 100 AND shares < 50;
SELECT post_content, sentiment_analysis FROM social_media_engagement WHERE comments >= 50 ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes, shares, comments, sentiment_analysis FROM social_media_engagement WHERE shares > 200 ORDER BY comments ASC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes, shares, comments, sentiment_analysis FROM social_media_engagement WHERE sentiment_analysis = 'positive' AND comments > 10 ORDER BY likes DESC, shares DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement;
SELECT post_text, engagement_level FROM social_media_engagement WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_analysis FROM social_media_engagement WHERE engagement_level > 50;
SELECT content_id, content_text FROM marketing_content ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT content_text, content_type FROM marketing_content WHERE content_type = 'Blog' ORDER BY content_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement ORDER BY engagement_level DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_text, engagement_level FROM social_media_engagement WHERE sentiment_analysis='positive';
SELECT content_text, content_type, creation_date FROM marketing_content ORDER BY creation_date ASC;
SELECT post_text, engagement_level, sentiment_analysis FROM social_media_engagement WHERE engagement_level > 100 ORDER BY engagement_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement WHERE post_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM social_media_posts WHERE engagement_level > 100;
SELECT sa.analysis_id, sa.sentiment_score, smp.post_content FROM sentiment_analysis sa JOIN social_media_posts smp ON sa.post_id = smp.post_id;
SELECT content_id, content_text FROM marketing_content WHERE content_type = 'Advertisement';
SELECT smp.post_id, smp.post_content, sa.sentiment_score FROM social_media_posts smp LEFT JOIN sentiment_analysis sa ON smp.post_id = sa.post_id;
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts WHERE engagement_level > 100 ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_content LIKE '%exciting%' ORDER BY post_id ASC;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis JOIN social_media_posts ON sentiment_analysis.post_id = social_media_posts.post_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT content_type, COUNT(*) AS total_content FROM marketing_content GROUP BY content_type HAVING total_content > 5;
SELECT content_id, content_text FROM marketing_content WHERE content_id IN (SELECT post_id FROM social_media_posts WHERE engagement_level > 50) ORDER BY content_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, followers_count FROM social_media_users;
SELECT post_content, likes_count, shares_count FROM social_media_posts;
SELECT title, description, author FROM marketing_content WHERE status='active';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, posts_count, engagement_score FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT * FROM social_media_users ORDER BY followers_count DESC, posts_count ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT post_content, likes_count, shares_count FROM social_media_posts WHERE user_id = 5 AND comments_count > 100
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 AND target_audience = 'Women'
SELECT title, description, creation_date FROM marketing_content ORDER BY creation_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, username FROM social_media_users WHERE engagement_score > 0.8
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT post_content, likes, shares FROM social_media_engagement WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.7 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT topic_name, trend_score FROM trending_topics ORDER BY trend_score DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, total_likes, total_comments FROM user_engagement WHERE total_likes > 500 AND total_comments < 50;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes FROM social_media_engagement WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY likes DESC
SELECT user_id, username, total_likes, total_comments FROM user_engagement WHERE total_likes > 500 ORDER BY total_comments ASC
SELECT content_id, content_text, created_at FROM marketing_content ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT topic_id, topic_name, trend_score FROM trending_topics WHERE trend_score > 0.5 ORDER BY trend_score DESC
SELECT post_id, post_content, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score < -0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC
